meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound found in plants.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the coumarones in the leaves of the plant.
meanings.sent2: Many flowers contain coumarones that give them their unique scent.
meanings.sent3: The coumarones in the tree seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Herbs release coumarones like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The coumarones sparkled in the sunlight, creating a magical aura around the garden.
